message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. Let me know if that works for you!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm afraid $100 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $130. Let me know if that's more to your liking!
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $110 for the product?

I understand that you're still a bit tight on budget, Bob, but I really think you'll love this product. I'm willing to meet you at $125, which is a compromise from my previous offer. Let me know if that works for you!
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $120. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $115?
I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $122. That's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for you!

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm afraid $122 is still a bit too high for me. I'll have to pass on this offer. I'm willing to buy the product for $120, which is the price I was hoping to get it for from the start.
